requirements.description: Build a simple scientific calculator web app using React framework.

features.name: Basic Arithmetic Operations
features.description: Perform addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.

features.name: Scientific Functions
features.description: Implement common scientific functions such as trigonometry (sin, cos, tan), logarithms (log, ln), exponentiation (e^x, x^y), square roots, etc.

features.name: Input/Output Display
features.description: Display the current input expression and the calculated result clearly.

features.name: Clear/Reset Functionality
features.description: Button to clear the current input and reset the calculator state.

features.name: Error Handling
features.description: Handle invalid operations such as division by zero, mathematical errors (e.g., log of non-positive number), and incorrect input formats.

features.name: User Interface for Operations
features.description: Interactive buttons for numbers, operators, and scientific functions.

requirements.user_input: build a simple scientific calculator web app using react framework
